SEARCH
Package project2

Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
project2.TransactionManager
public class TransactionManager extends Object
Takes user commands relating to managing transactions for RU Bank First checks if user command is valid Contains separate functionality for commands starting with O, C, D, WP, PI, UB, and Q
Author:
Nicholas Yim, Zain Zulfiqar

    TransactionManager()

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionManager

      public TransactionManager()
      Instantiates new account database for all open accounts and a closed accounts array to keep track of closed accounts. Sets isRunning to true to receive inputs.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Initiates scanner and begins program Continuously reads command lines from console until "Q" command is entered

    • handleOCommand

      private void handleOCommand(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Handles "O" command
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - as StringTokenizer

    • handleCCommand

      private void handleCCommand(StringTokenizer tokenizer)

    • handleDCommand

      private void handleDCommand(StringTokenizer tokenizer)

    • handleWCommand

      private void handleWCommand(StringTokenizer tokenizer)

    • handlePCommand

      private void handlePCommand(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Handles "P" command whether account database is empty or not. Prints entire account database sorted by account type and profile if account database is not empty. Prints error message if account database is empty.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - as StringTokenizer

    • handlePICommand

      private void handlePICommand(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Handles "PI" command whether account database is empty or not. Prints entire account database sorted as in "P" command, along with fees and monthly interests if account database is not empty. Prints error message if account database is empty.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - as StringTokenizer

    • handleUBCommand

      private void handleUBCommand(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Handles "UB" command whether account database is empty or not. Updates the account balance for all accounts by applying fees and interests earned and prints entire account database if account database is not empty. Prints error message if account database is empty.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - as StringTokenizer

    • parseDate

      private Date parseDate(String dateString)
      Parses date string from command line and converts to Date object
      Parameters:
      dateString - date of event as String
      Returns:
      created date as Date object

    • futureDateCheck

      private boolean futureDateCheck(Date date)
      Checks if birthday user is inputting is in the future
      Parameters:
      date - of birthday
      Returns:
      true if date is today or in the future, false otherwise

    • ageCheck

      private boolean ageCheck(Date date, String accountType)
      Checks if user has valid date of birth (age) to open an account User must be at least 16 years old to open any account and must be under 24 years old to open a College Checking account Prints error message if date of birth is invalid
      Parameters:
      date - as Date
      accountType - as String
      Returns:
      true if valid DOB, false if invalid DOB

    • calculateAge

      private int calculateAge(Date currentDate, Date ageDate)
      Calculates age of user using Calendar class
      Parameters:
      currentDate - as Date
      ageDate - as Date
      Returns:
      age as int

    • isValidDOB

      private boolean isValidDOB(Date dob, String accountType)
      Checks if date of birth is valid or not Three separate checks: if DOB is a valid calendar date, if it is not today or a future day, and if age is valid Prints corresponding error message for valid calendar date and today/future day.
      Parameters:
      dob - as Date
      accountType - as String
      Returns:
      true if all checks pass, false if any of them fail

    • isValidInitialDeposit

      private static boolean isValidInitialDeposit(String initialDepositString)
      Checks if initial deposit is valid Two separate checks: if deposit is a double and if deposit is greater than 0 Prints corresponding error message if initial deposit is invalid
      Parameters:
      initialDepositString - as String
      Returns:
      true if all checks pass, false if any of them fail

    • isValidAmount

      private static boolean isValidAmount(String amountString, String operationType)
      Checks if amount (withdraw or deposit) is valid Two separate checks: if amount is a double and if amount is greater than 0 Prints corresponding error message if amount is invalid
      Parameters:
      amountString - as String
      operationType - as String ("Withdraw" or "Deposit")
      Returns:
      true if all checks pass, false if any of them fail

    • openChecking

      private void openChecking(String fName, String lName, Date dob, double initialDeposit)
      Opens Checking account by calling general open account method
      Parameters:
      fName - as String
      lName - as String
      dob - as Date
      initialDeposit - as double

    • openCollegeChecking

      private void openCollegeChecking(String fName, String lName, Date dob, double initialDeposit, StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Opens College Checking account by calling general open account method Checks if there is missing data and if the campus code is valid Prints corresponding error message if any of the checks fail
      Parameters:
      fName - as String
      lName - as String
      dob - as Date
      initialDeposit - as double

    • openSavings

      private void openSavings(String fName, String lName, Date dob, double initialDeposit, StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Opens Savings account by calling general open account method Checks if there is missing data Prints error message if there is missing data
      Parameters:
      fName - as String
      lName - as String
      dob - as Date
      initialDeposit - as double

    • openMoneyMarket

      private void openMoneyMarket(String fName, String lName, Date dob, double initialDeposit)
      Opens Money Market account by calling general open account method Checks if initial deposit it at least 2000 Prints error message if initial deposit is less than 2000
      Parameters:
      fName - as String
      lName - as String
      dob - as Date
      initialDeposit - as double

    • openAccount

      private void openAccount(String fName, String lName, Date dob, Account account, String accountType)
      General open account method to handle opening an account given identifying parameters Calls 'open' method and checks if account is already in the database Prints message indicating if account is opened or if it is already in the database
      Parameters:
      fName - as String
      lName - as String
      dob - as Date
      account - as Account
      accountType - as String

    • withdrawAccount

      private void withdrawAccount(String fName, String lName, Date dob, Account account, double withdraw, String accountType)
      General withdraw account method to handle withdrawing value from an account given identifying parameters Calls 'withdraw' method and performs two checks (insufficient fund and not in database) then performs the withdrawal action if account and withdraw value are valid Prints message indicating to specific error or indicating if withdrawal is successful
      Parameters:
      fName - as String
      lName - as String
      dob - as Date
      account - as Account
      withdraw - as double
      accountType - as String
